author: Odeinoichus
title: Final Villain of the Roster!
review:
Set #71020 Doctor Phosphorus: This little known villain is a danger to everybody and everyone as he is quite nuclear and very deadly. This minifigure features heavy details of a LEGO Skeleton printed on the torso, the legs, the arms (side-printing) and the face showing the hideously deformed being Phosphorus has become. The only thing missing would be the back of the skull, I'm actually surprised they did not print this too, considering the amount of detail used to make the character.

Doctor Phosphorus includes two green flame effects, which he uses to simulate launching nuclear blasts at his foes. He is dressed in a pair of enhanced shorts preventing them from burning up, so he can at least wear some clothing. I can't help feeling this was an inspiration behind the main villain in Batman Beyond, but this represents the OG character.

Overall. Strongly Recommended.
